name: KLHT1040AMHonolulu
0:
”Alexa, play K. Light Ten Forty A. M.”
”pause”
”stop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. light ten forty a. m.
des: This skill provides Solid Bible Teaching & Worship music from K-Light Radio, 1040 AM Honolulu, featuring Christ-centered "Teaching & Talk" around the clock! This skill aims to point listeners to the truth of the gospel of Jesus Christ, both through inspirational worship music and the teaching of the Bible, because "all scripture is inspired by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, for training in righteousness." Also, try the the Alexa skill: "K-Light 91.5 FM" to check out our sister station "Worship and the Word Radio", KLHT-FM Honolulu!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
